projects.title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
projects.subtitle: Backend for Book Rating Website
projects.shortDescription: Development of the backend for a book rating website for a local bookstore chain
projects.detailedDescription: Mon Vieux Grimoire is a web application that allows members to add and rate books. I was responsible for creating and developing the backend of this website. My role involved setting up the RESTful API that handles book-related operations, user authentication, and review management. I used Node.js and Express.js for server-side development, along with MongoDB as the database using Mongoose as the ODM. I also implemented user authentication using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) to ensure data security. The backend provides robust features such as Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations for books, user management, and review validation. I worked collaboratively with a frontend developer to seamlessly integrate the frontend with the backend. The project followed best practices in data security, unique email validation, and the implementation of middlewares for request handling.
competencies: Implementation of a logical data model in compliance with regulations

projects.title: Kasa - Booking Web Application
projects.subtitle: Front-end development with React for a booking platform
projects.shortDescription: Development of the web platform for accomodation booking for the company Kasa
projects.detailedDescription: Kasa is a company specialized in apartment rentals between individuals in France. In this project, I was tasked with developing the front-end web application for accomodation booking for Kasa using React technology. My role involved creating and developing React components, setting up routes with React Router, and following the provided mockups. I added a CSS animation to the opening/closing of the Collapse component to enhance the user experience. The project followed Kasa's coding guidelines to ensure code quality.
competencies: Configuring navigation between application pages with React Router
Using React to create interactive components
Implementing CSS animations to enhance the user experience

projects.title: Debugging and Optimization of a Photographer's Website
projects.subtitle: SEO Optimization and Technical Issue Resolution
projects.shortDescription: Optimization and debugging of a professional photographer's website
projects.detailedDescription: In this project, I optimized the website of a professional photographer, Nina Carducci, by improving its performance and search engine optimization. I analyzed the site, reduced loading time, and fixed accessibility errors. I optimized the images without compromising their quality, improved the code, and added meta tags and Schema.org for local search engine optimization. I resolved specific issues such as faulty navigation in the gallery and incorrect filter display. I used Chrome DevTools to debug the site and prepared a detailed intervention report with performance metrics before and after optimization.
competencies: Debugging a website using Chrome DevTools
Writing an intervention report to test a website
